name: Farmyard Architect
description:
This is a game of which the goal is to teach younger children about Farm Safety through accident prevention management.
This game was made for Agrikids for Farm Safety Week.

Created by TUD Students:

Conor Dunne - Secondary Programmer

Finbar Walsh - Sound Artist

Micheala Blanchfield - Main 2D & 3D Artist

Sergiu Gilgeanu - Project Manager

Tomasz Galka - Lead Programmer, 3D Artist, Unity Developer & World Designer

External Credits:

FreeSound.org for sounds:

A Beautiful Morning/Purple Planet Music/ https://www.purple-planet.com/gentle

wind_gust_short_sqeeeek/ Sqeeeek/https://freesound.org/people/sqeeeek/sounds/381853/

Font Used:

ChelseaMarket (Google Font under the Open Font License which enables us to use it freely)

Special thanks to:

Alma Jordan from Agrikids for constantly supporting and providing crucial information throughout the development of the game.

Play the tutorial to find out more on how to play the game and we hope that you have fun playing it!
There is no saving feature as this game should be Short and Sweet.

If you hear a sound you own in this game and we have no credited it, please tell us about it.
We would also love to get your feedback on the game and bug reports can also be filed in this manner.


Contact:
E-Mail: tommy.galk@gmail.com
Discord: Riko Riko Rii#0911

Known Bugs

Upon pressing the New Game button on Mobile Devices, there is a chance you might encounter a Memory-related error. This error is random and can disappear after a simple refresh. If you consistently get this error, please contact us with your phone specs so we can test it on our side.
